Package dao

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
CustomerDAO -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> loadAllCustomers()
      loadAllCustomers -- queries the db and gets all customers from the customers table
      Returns:
      -- returns an ObservableList of all customers and their data from the customers table.

    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Timestamp createDate, String createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId)
      addCustomer -- Creates a new customer/entry in the db customers table
      Parameters:
      customerName - -- customer name
      address - -- address
      postalCode - -- postal code
      phoneNumber - -- phone number
      createDate - -- Timestamp when customer entry created
      createdBy - -- User name that created the customer
      lastUpdate - -- Timestamp when customer entry was last updaated
      lastUpdatedBy - -- User name that last updated the the customer
      divisionId - -- state/province id

    • updateCustomer

      public static void updateCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phoneNumber, Timestamp lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionId, int customerId)
      updateCustomer -- updates the customer/entry in the db customers table that matchs the given customerId
      Parameters:
      customerName - -- customer name
      address - -- address
      postalCode - -- postal code
      phoneNumber - -- phone number
      lastUpdate - -- Timestamp when customer entry was last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - -- User name that last updated the customer entry
      divisionId - -- state/province id
      customerId - -- customer id used find the matching customer to be updated

    • deleteCustomer

      public static void deleteCustomer(int customerId)
      deleteCustomer -- deletes customer entry from the db customer table that matches the customerId
      Parameters:
      customerId - -- customer id used to find the matching customer to be deleted
